question.body: Hugli’s Blueberry Ranch near Pembroke has an annual pumpkin growing contest. In 2011 the heaviest pumpkin weighed:
Where was the winning 2011 pumpkin in the Hugli’s contest grown?
What is the 2011 world record weight for a pumpkin?

quiz.errata: The largest pumpkin in the world was grown by the Bryson family in Ormstown, Quebec.
